reviews.review_msg: I love Carleigh. I'm in 4th year and am honestly just tired of uni and ready to graduate, but I actually looked forward to her classes (and they were NIGHT classes!) I think she gave great advice in creative writing and really cares about her students. Considering how easy this course is, I learned a lot because she made me want to learn :)

Don't take his class if you just want to passively listen to a lecture. If your into writing and want to explore what that means than take his class. He'll give you decent feedback and give you a space to explore your own uniques writing style rather than give negate your creative experience. Yes you might have to think a little!
